short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capfizz sentry node mining for chrome
short.ko: React, Typescript, Vite를 사용한 크롬 익스텐션 보일러플레이트입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Sentry Node Mining Manager - Your All-in-One Mining Dashboard

Efficiently manage and monitor your Sentry Node mining operations right from your browser. This extension provides a seamless interface to track your mining activities in real-time.

Key Features:
✨ Real-time Mining Monitor
• Track mining status and performance
• View current hash rates and rewards
• Monitor node health and connectivity

📊 Dashboard Analytics
• Detailed mining statistics
• Historical performance data
• Reward tracking and analysis

🔔 Smart Notifications
• Instant alerts for important events
• Node status changes
• Reward distribution notifications

⚙️ Easy Management
• Quick access through browser sidebar
• Intuitive control interface
• Simplified node configuration

🛡️ Security First
• Secure connection to mining network
• Encrypted data transmission
• Privacy-focused design

💡 User-Friendly Interface
• Clean and modern design
• Easy-to-read metrics
• Simplified controls

Perfect for:
• Sentry Node operators
• Cryptocurrency miners
• Blockchain enthusiasts

This extension requires minimal permissions and only connects to authorized mining endpoints to ensure your security and privacy.

Note: This extension is designed specifically for Sentry Node mining operations and requires an existing Sentry Node setup to function.

Support:
For technical support or questions, please visit our website or contact our support team through the extension's help section.

Privacy & Security:
We prioritize your privacy and security. This extension only collects data necessary for mining operations and does not share any personal information with third parties.

Updates:
Regular updates ensure compatibility and optimal performance with the latest mining protocols.
